name: night-shade
effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
short_effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

flavor_text.black-white: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user’s level.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user’s level.
